titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Seattle Storm women's basketball team on winning the 2020 Women's National Basketball Association Championship.
A resolution congratulating the Seattle Storm women's basketball team on winning the 2020 Women's National Basketball Association Championship.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the achievements of the players, coaches, fans, and staff whose dedication helped the Seattle Storm women's basketball team win the 2020 Women's National Basketball Association Championship.
